TIL: Form attribute

Published on December 12, 2020
1 min to read

You can submit forms from a button outside of the form tag by using the form attribute (source and discussion)

Can be useful for example in a reset or submit form button, that is placed somewhere outside due to design demands.

Supported - everywhere except IE11
